I had no problems - try updating your codec pack

I'm still downloading, so I won't comment on the actual quality of these videos.

However, IF the audio is out of sync, all decent media players should have the ability to adjust the audio/video timing. Look around in the audio options, and you should be able to find somewhere that'll let you enter a delay (negative or positive) for the audio.

Just takes a little tweaking to fix. Not the end of the world, and certainly no reason not to be able to watch a video.
